heading: Today
text: Dense river valley fog early.  Becoming cloudy. Rain showers developing in NY, spreading east in the afternoon.  Highs in the 40s, near 40 northeast.  South winds near 10 mph east of the Green Mountains, increasing to 10 to 15 mph, gusting 30 to 40 mph from the Green Mountains west, up to 50 mph in northern NY.

heading: Tonight
text: Rain showers tapering off.  Mostly cloudy, then some clearing after midnight.  Lows in the low to mid 30s, near 30 over the higher terrain north.  South winds 15 to 25 mph, gusting 30 to 40 mph, up to 50 mph in northern NY, shifting to the northwest and decreasing to near 10 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Some morning sun, then thickening clouds.  A chance of rain far south late.  Highs in the 30s to near 40 north, low to mid 40s south.  Northwest winds near 10 mph, becoming more north to northeast and diminishing through the afternoon.
